channel.title: Comments on: Iggy and the Stooges
channel.description: Won't you join me for a crazy crazy China adventure?

item.title: by: vanessa
item.description: it would be so much funnier if there were three stooges and not just one
item.content:encoded: it would be so much funnier if there were three stooges and not just one

item.title: by: elenore
item.description: make the stooge wear the hat he gets to go for free he wears the hat!!!
item.content:encoded:
make the stooge wear the hat
he gets to go for free
he wears the hat!!!

item.title: by: robert
item.description:
maybe if you turn the hat backwards? or put a big capital A on it, so you can be like Alvin from the Chipmunks.
have you eaten dogs or scorpions yet?
item.content:encoded:
maybe if you turn the hat backwards? or put a big capital A on it, so you can be like Alvin from the Chipmunks.

have you eaten dogs or scorpions yet?

item.title: by: Gale
item.description: Don't worry, he probably didn't plant a bug. I'm sure it was there before you even got there. Don't be too nice, and miss out on cool shit you want to do. Hopefully you will have fun no matter what.
item.content:encoded: Don’t worry, he probably didn’t plant a bug. I’m sure it was there before you even got there. Don’t be too nice, and miss out on cool shit you want to do. Hopefully you will have fun no matter what.
